item.title: Distributed directory for mobile
item.description: It’s basically Distributed directory project, with mobile-friendly UI on top of it. Thanks to C# being multiplatform, it was relatively easy to port it to Android devices by using Xamarin. Source code of this project is yet to be published. Screenshot:
